title: Dodgers in ranked
body:
I think the punishment for dodging ranked should be a higher loss in LP and a longish wait.
 Ive just been through about 5 champ selects with people deciding that they dont like the champ their mid is playing or enemy they have to face and decide to dodge rather then play the game or just going afk. I dont dodge and the only excuse for dodging should be if you have a troll on your team.
What do you guys think about this? And is it like this everywhere or just Bronze in OCE?
Its so frustrating having a support dodge so you have to wait another 5mins for someone to select fill {{item:3070}}
Up arrow and get peoples attention with this.

replies.body: I would much rather them dodge then complain all game like the baby they are.

It's like this on every server in every elo. 

While it is frustrating, dodging can often be due to legit reasons and does incur quite strict penalties.
>[DYNAMIC RANKED QUEUE
1 queue dodge: 6 minute queue penalty. Lose 3 LP.
2+ queue dodges: 30 minute queue penalty. Lose 10 LP.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201751844-Queue-Dodging)

I dodged a game last night, not because I had a troll in my team, but because our jungler was on a 20+ game loss streak with a KDA of 0.8. The current system allows for strategic dodging such as this, but doesn't let it go overboard without punishment (which is great IMO, despite the wait times).

Especially when there is a lee sin, leblanc or zed on my team. ALL of the people other than me who have picked these champions feed their ass off (and ive played like 500 ranked games). Just had a lee sin go 0/4  in my most recent game, shoulda dodged

Its just so frustrating waiting a v long time for game then having dodgers, i understand ur dodging that one but there should be a better system so that those people dont get put with "non-trolls" or people on winning streaks....
Dont you agree?
And as im typing this someone dodged after waiting all champ select
GG
I would much rather that they would dodge and not troll in the game / afk because whats worse losing 5 minutes of your time or losing a large amount of lp?
